images.copyright: Bluebonnets growing alongside an old road in the Texas Hill Country (© Inge Johnsson/Alamy)
images.title: Where the wildflowers grow
images.caption: Where the wildflowers grow
images.desc: Today we're marvelling at a field of blooming bluebonnets, the state flower of Texas. The state’s Department of Transportation sows tens of thousands of pounds of wildflower seeds along roadways each year.
